name: Roll20 Audio Master
description:
Roll20 Audio Master (a.k.a Roll20AM)  allows control of the jukebox via the chat interface and expands upon the standard jukebox functionality with some additional commands.
### Getting Started
* Import all Jukebox tracks & playlists to the Roll20AM: `!roll20AM --config,import`
* Access the config menu `!roll20AM --config`
* play a track named 'Wind' `!roll20AM --audio,play|Wind`
###[Roll20AM Documentation](https://wiki.roll20.net/Script:Roll20_Audio_Master)
